# Tender Announcement for Audit Services for Canadian Grain Commission

## Introduction

The Government of Canada invites bids for a contract to provide audit services for the Canadian Grain Commission. 

### Background

The Canadian Grain Commission is seeking an external auditor to provide an independent opinion on its annual financial statements, including its Revolving Fund for Fiscal Year 2023-2024.

## Tender Details

### Tender Title

- Title: Audit of the Canadian Grain Commission’s Financial Statements
- Description: The Canadian Grain Commission is seeking an external auditor to provide an independent audit opinion on its annual financial statements.

### Tender Submission

- **Reference Number:** cb-9136-29225438
- **Solicitation Number:** 5K001-20231281-001-CGC
- **Tender Closing Date:** October 18, 2023, at 15:00:00

### Contract Duration

- **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 1, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** October 31, 2028, with an option to renew for up to four (4) additional years.

### Security Requirements

- A minimum corporate security clearance of Secret is required.

### Selection Criteria

- The selection criteria will be based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

### Contact Information

- **Name:** Sheila Kvern
- **Email:** sheila.kvern@grainscanada.gc.ca
- **Phone:** (204) 983-8302

## Instructions for Bidders

- Bidders must submit their proposals in accordance with the Request for Proposal (RFP) guidelines.
- The RFP will be e-mailed directly to pre-qualified suppliers.
- Enquiries regarding this RFP must be received by email no later than October 18, 2023, at 14:00 CDT.
